      # OLTransform 平移功能

      # 地图矢量图层中平移图形要素

      # 平移功能是将在地图上绘制的元素整体平移

      <template>
<div style="height: 400px; width: 100%">
    <!-- 地图组件 -->
    <OLMap>
        <!-- 基础底图高德瓦片 -->
        <AMapTileLayer />
        <OLVectorLayer title="矢量图层1">
            <!-- 矢量数据源组件 -->
            <OLVectorSource ref="targetSource">
                <!-- 图形元素 -->
                <OLFeature :geoType="geoType" :coordinates="coordinates" :properties="properties"></OLFeature>
            </OLVectorSource>
        </OLVectorLayer>
        <OLBar>
            <OLBar :toggleOne="true">
                <OLToggle icon="fa fa-circle" title="画点" @onToggle="_onToggleDraw($event, 'drawPoint')">
                    <OLDraw geoType="Point" ref="drawPoint"/>
                </OLToggle>
                <OLToggle icon="fa fa-pencil" title="画线" @onToggle="_onToggleDraw($event, 'drawLine')">
                    <OLDraw geoType="LineString" ref="drawLine"@drawend="_onLineStringDrawend"/>
                </OLToggle>
                <OLToggle icon="fa fa-pencil-square-o" title="画面" @onToggle="_onToggleDraw($event, 'drawPolygon')">
                    <OLDraw geoType="Polygon" ref="drawPolygon"/>
                </OLToggle>
                <OLToggle title="平移图形" icon="fa fa-arrows" @onToggle="_onToggleMove">
                    <OLTranslate ref="translate"/>
                </OLToggle>
            </OLBar>
        </OLBar>
    </OLMap>
  </div>
</template>

<script>
export default {
    data: function(){
        return {
            // 几何类型
            geoType: "Point",
            // 经纬度坐标
            coordinates: [116.302778,40.050833],
            // 属性信息
            properties: {
                name: "中恒博瑞",
                // 样式配置
                style: {
                    // 点元素渲染为矢量圆形
                    image: {
                        // 圆形
                        circle: {
                            // 半径
                            radius: 6,
                            // 边框线颜色
                            stroke: "red",
                            // 填充颜色及透明度，使用rgba渲染
                            fill: "rgba(0,0,0,0.5)"
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    },
    methods: {
       
        _onToggleDraw: function(active, type) {
            if(active){
                let source = this.$refs.targetSource.mapObject;
                this.$refs[type].setSource(source);
            }
        },

        _onToggleMove: function(active, type) {
            let source = this.$refs.targetSource.mapObject;
            !active && this.$refs.translate.clear();
            active && this.$refs.translate.addFeatures(source.getFeatures());
        },
        
        _onLineStringDrawend: function(evt) {
            evt.feature.set("style", {
                stroke:
                    {
                        color: "green", 
                        width: 2, 
                    }
            })
        }
    }
}
</script>
      显示代码 复制代码 复制代码

      # 属性

      参数 说明 类型 可选值 默认值
      pixelTolerance 像素容限，用于考虑指针足够接近线段或定点进行编辑 Number - 10

      # 事件

      事件名称 说明 回调参数
      clear 清空已有修改
      addFeatures 添加新图形要素 features

      ← OLTransform 变换功能 OLDelete 删除功能 →
